sentences.en: Even as a humanitarian mission it has been only a qualified success.
sentences.cn: 即便是作为一次人道主义行动，它也不过是取得了有限的成功。

sentences.en: He claims a 70 to 80 per cent success rate.
sentences.cn: 他声称成功率有七到八成。

sentences.en: I think the only common denominator of success is hard work.
sentences.cn: 我认为取得成功唯一的共同要素是勤奋。

sentences.en: She had already achieved success beyond her wildest dreams.
sentences.cn: 她已经取得超乎想象的成功。

sentences.en: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.--Winston Churchill
sentences.cn: 成功不是终点，失败也并非末日，最重要的是继续前进的勇气。

sentences.en: Success is not guaranteed. It is not handed to you. Success is earned.
sentences.cn: 成功无法保证，并非唾手可得。成功必须靠自己去争取。

sentences.en: Talent, hard work and sheer tenacity are all crucial to career success.
sentences.cn: 事业要成功，才能、勤奋和顽强的意志都至关重要。

sentences.en: The Ariane space-rocket project has had a shining success.
sentences.cn: 阿里安航天火箭项目取得了辉煌的成功。

sentences.en: The British team did not disguise their delight at their success.
sentences.cn: 英国队毫不掩饰他们获胜的喜悦。

sentences.en: The company was coasting on the enormous success of its early products.
sentences.cn: 公司凭借早期产品的巨大成功而在市场上遥遥领先。

sentences.en: The experiment was a big success.
The key to his success is his logical mind.
sentences.cn: 他成功的关键在于他擅长逻辑思维。

sentences.en: The service is being expanded following the success of a pilot scheme.
sentences.cn: 在试验性方案获得成功后，这项服务正在推广中。

sentences.en: Their success does not necessarily reflect a leftward shift in politics.
sentences.cn: 他们的成功并不一定表示政治气候转向亲左。

sentences.en: There is often a strong accent on material success.
sentences.cn: 经常大力强调物质成就。

sentences.en: We hope it will be a commercial success.
sentences.cn: 我们希望它会是一次商业成功。

sentences.en: What determines whether you are a career success or a failure?
sentences.cn: 事业的成败取决于哪些因素？

phrases.tran_cn: 把…做得十分成功，在…上取得成功(或做出成绩)

trans.tran_en: when you achieve what you want or intend
